
{{alias}}( n, k )
    Computes the binomial coefficient of two integers.

    If `k < 0`, the function returns `0`.

    The function returns `NaN` for non-integer `n` or `k`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    n: integer
        First input value.

    k: integer
        Second input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 8, 2 )
    28
    > v = {{alias}}( 0, 0 )
    1
    > v = {{alias}}( -4, 2 )
    10
    > v = {{alias}}( 5, 3 )
    10
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN, 3 )
    NaN
    > v = {{alias}}( 5, NaN )
    NaN
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN, NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
